|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "Rev:A1", a lead-free logo, and "Made in China" is silkscreened on one DIR-615 I1's board. {{seealso|D-Link DIR-615 series}} ==Links of Interest== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=154842 On the DD-WRT forums] *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/d-link/dir-615 ''DIR-615'' on '''OpenWRT''' Wiki] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== Supported by dd-wrt as of = dir615i build 19519 20120720 Please insert instructions here ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|notrecommended}} {{OpenWrtNotice|insufficient}} {{OpenWrtNotice|endsupport|2022|19.07.10}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/d-link/d-link_dir-615_i1 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/d-link/dir-615 |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=43515 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = 15.05.1 |current_supported_version = 17.01.2 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== 
(3.3) (RxD) (TxD) (GND)
J8
----> to AR9341
{{/Serial info}} [[Category:English Documentation]]
